title: New York truck attack: White House calls suspect 'enemy combatant' â as it happened | US news | The Guardian
summary: white house brands suspect an 'enemy combatant '
police try to retrace new york attacker 's moves .
nypd officer hailed for stopping truck suspect .
suspect carried out truck attack 'in name of isis ' after weeks of planning .
how the us green card lottery works .

text: we 're going to wrap up our live coverage for the day .
here 's what we know : new york authorities say an investigation of tuesday 's attack is under way .
there are no known related security threats at this time , they said .
donald trump called for tightened immigration restrictions and said he was open to the suspect being detained in the prison at guantanamo bay , cuba .
trump blamed democrats for immigration law he contended enabled the attack .
he also said due process under the law in the usa is a joke and it 's a laughingstock .
governor andrew cuomo suggested trump was playing into the terrorists ' hands and said the attack should not be politicized .
law enforcement officials were piecing together the suspect 's movements in recent weeks and months .
they said he had been planning the attack for weeks .
eight died and 12 were injured in the attack .
of the dead , five were from argentina , on from belgium and two from the united states .
read our latest news story here : police try to retrace new york attacker 's moves as trump sows discord read more
sanders denies that trump called the justice system a laughingstock .
instead she says the president said that the process of trying terror suspects in court is regarded by others as a laughingstock .
but she 's mischaracterizing what he said .
trump said we need quick justice because what we have right now is a joke and it 's a laughingstock .
full quote : we have to come up with punishment that 's far quicker and far greater than the punishment these animals are getting right now .
they 'll go through court for years , at the end they 'll be - who knows what happens .
we need quick justice , we need strong justice , much quicker and much stronger than we have right now , because what we have right now is a joke and it 's a laughingstock .
josh marshall ( @ joshtpm ) trump lashes out at us federal justice system as `` joke '' and `` laughing stock . ''
trump 's call is for frontier justice , battlefield justice , justice outside due process , outside the constitution , outside the law .
the press secretary is asked about trump 's calling the us justice system a laughingstock .
he was voicing his frustration with the lengthy process that often comes with a case like this , huckabee sanders says .
due process : it takes too long .

documents.title: white house brands suspect an 'enemy combatant '
text: i believe we would consider this person to be an enemy combatant , yes , huckabee sanders said .
but that does n't mean the administration does not support trying him in federal court .

the enemy combatant designation has a narrow legal definition with implications for the detainees ' rights and potential trial , and the label has never been applied to a suspect detained in the united states .
huckabee sanders is asked about the president 's willingness to send him to gitmo .
she basically makes clear that that was something the president just said but there 's no thinking behind it : he supports or would support that but he was n't necessarily advocating for it .
the president 's not blamed senator schumer .
he does n't believe that the senator is responsible for the attack , says huckabee sanders .
white house press secretary sarah sanders is holding a press briefing .
she denies that the president was going the political route by attacking chuck schumer on twitter this morning .
trump has now spoken with both nyc mayor bill de blasio and new york governor andrew cuomo , sanders says .

documents.title: police try to retrace new york attacker 's moves
text: the terrorist suspect who used a rented truck to kill eight people and injure 12 in the manhattan attack had been planning the incident for weeks and followed islamic state guidelines to a t , new york police said on wednesday .

as the twisted and gnarled truck that was used to plough down unsuspecting tourists and cyclists remained parked on the spot where it had come to a halt on tuesday afternoon , fbi and nypd officers fanned out across the city and through neighboring new jersey .

they were armed with search warrants relating to sayfullo saipov , the 29-year-old uzbek-born suspect who was shot in the stomach and who is still under guard in stable condition at the city 's bellevue hospital .
at a press conference on wednesday , police and city authorities revealed vivid details of items that were found at the scene of the worst terrorist incident that new york has suffered since 9/11 .
inside the truck , notes were found handwritten in arabic proclaiming that islamic state would endure for ever .
a number of knives were scattered around the vehicle , as were two dummy guns .
police said the aim now was to peel back saipov 's communications to reconstruct his every move , day by day .

they would be interviewing relatives and friends , collecting footage from security cameras along the route of the attack , scouring saipov 's family home where he was living with his wife and three children in paterson , new jersey , as well as searching the rented home depot truck and his own white van left at the rental location .
read further : police try to retrace new york attacker 's moves as trump sows discord read more

documents.title: argentina mourns new york victims
text: above the grey walls of the san martã­n polytechnic in the argentinian city of rosario , the white and blue national flag flew at half-mast on wednesday , as the country mourned five friends who were mown down in the new york truck attack during a trip to celebrate the 30th anniversary of their graduation from the school .
the five argentinian victims were all well-known architects and businessmen in rosario , an economic powerhouse and the hometown of ernesto che guevara and lionel messi .
they were among eight friends who travelled from argentina on sunday for a trip to new york and boston , near where one of their classmates lives .
a taken at rosario airport shows them dressed in matching white t-shirts emblazoned with the word libre ( spanish for free ) which had been designed especially for the trip .
only three of the group survived tuesday 's attack .
read further : argentina mourns new york victims : businessmen , architects and lifelong friends read more

documents.title: nypd officer hailed for stopping truck suspect
text: the police officer being hailed a hero for shooting the suspect in the deadly terror attack in new york on tuesday thought this was all in a day 's work , mayor bill de blasio said on wednesday .

beat officer ryan nash , 28 , was at home on long island on leave on wednesday after having shot the man who mowed down cyclists and pedestrians on a manhattan cycle path and crashed the vehicle he was driving , leaping out and brandishing weapons while yelling in the street .
he 's at home , one nypd detective told the guardian on wednesday , asking that his name be withheld because he was not authorized to speak publicly on the matter .
but not in any punitive sense .
what he did was nothing short of heroic and we are grateful .
but it was a very overwhelming incident .
nash and his uniformed partner at the nypd first precinct in lower manhattan were the first officers on the scene .
read further : 'nothing short of heroic ' : nypd officer hailed for stopping truck suspect read more

documents.title: new jersey man among victims
text: a project manager for moody 's investors service at the world trade center is among those killed in the bike path attack in new york city , the ap reports : the father of 32-year-old victim darren drake says his son had recently lost more than 90 pounds and was out for a bike ride between meetings when the truck hit him .
father jimmy drake says that while other people would take cigarette or coffee breaks , he would go out and ride the bike for 15 or 20 minutes .
drake used to serve on the school board in new milford , in northern new jersey , where he was a native and lived with his parents .
jimmy drake says he drove his son every day to the train terminal in hoboken so he could catch a train to his job in the city .

documents.title: suspect carried out truck attack 'in name of isis ' after weeks of planning
text: jessica glenza reports from paterson , nj , and lois beckett from new york : sayfullo saipov , the suspect in a new york city truck attack that left eight people dead and a dozen wounded , was a legal permanent resident of the united states who was radicalized domestically and carried out the attack in the name of isis , officials said on wednesday .

saipov , a 29-year-old who came to the united states from uzbekistan in 2010 on a diversity visa , appears to have followed almost exactly to a t the instructions that isis has put out in its social media channels for carrying out an attack , the new york police department deputy commissioner , john miller , said .
it appeared saipov had been planning the attack for a number of weeks , he said .
handwritten notes in arabic recovered at the scene of the attack included symbols and words with the basic message that the islamic state would endure forever , miller said .
while saipov was not himself the subject of a previous nypd or fbi investigation , he did have some connectivity to people who had been the subject of investigation , miller said .
in 2015 , prosecutors announced charges against two uzbek nationals living in brooklyn for allegedly attempting to join islamic state militants in syria .
it is not clear if saipov 's connections were to subjects in this investigation or another .

the justice department announced last friday that one of those two men , abdurasul hasanovich juraboev , a 27-year-old uzbek citizen living in brooklyn , had been sentenced to 15 years in prison for conspiring to provide material support to isis .
read further : sayfullo saipov carried out truck attack 'in name of isis ' after weeks of planning read more

documents.title: how the us green card lottery works
text: [ reprinted from may ] : getting randomly selected by the us state department would usually strike fear in the heart of foreigners .
but on tuesday , more than 100,000 people around the world will be chosen for the state department 's diversity immigrant visa program , also known as the green card lottery .
the prize ?
a golden ticket to the land of the free , and the possibility of a new life .
the green card lottery is a uniquely american proposition .
every year , 50,000 people win the chance to become permanent residents simply by filling out an online form in the fall .
the process is random , and names are simply drawn out of millions of entries .
you do n't need to be sponsored , you do n't need family in the us , you do n't need employment .
you do not need to fill out dozens of forms , get a medical exam or be closely vetted to apply ( although you will face such requirements if you 're selected ) .

not everyone is eligible , however : citizens of countries that have had 50,000 green cards awarded in the last five years including the uk , mexico , canada , china , india and brazil can not apply .
radovan serbula , who came from croatia in 1997 with his wife and young son after winning the green card lottery , says it was not an easy decision .
we did n't know anybody in the us no friends , no family , he said .
we moved over here with no job , no english , nothing .
but we decided to go and give it a shot .
he left a successful career as an international basketball coach behind and , upon arrival in the us , earned $ 6 an hour working in the stockroom of a toy store in boston .
his first paycheck for a week of full-time work was n't enough to cover his rent , so serbula started working nights as a parking valet , stuffing tips in his pockets .
read further : a one in a million chance at a better life : will the us green card lottery survive ?
read more
the president remains unimpressed with the rule of law in the united states .
josh marshall ( @ joshtpm ) trump lashes out at us federal justice system as `` joke '' and `` laughing stock . ''
renato mariotti ( @ renato mariotti ) 3/ trump claims the system is too aggressive when his friends are charged with crimes , but he thinks it 's too slow when others are charged .

documents.title: trump 's politicised reaction to new york attack a far cry from las vegas shooting
text: one prompted a sombre tone , quotation from scripture and prayer for unity .
the other brought a barrage of tweets , peppered with capital letters and exclamation marks and bent on divisiveness and blame .
donald trump had sharply contrasting responses to the mass shooting in las vegas and the terrorist attack in new york that bookended the month of october .

the morning after stephen paddock fired hundreds of rifle rounds from his suite on the 32nd floor of the mandalay bay hotel in las vegas , killing 58 people at a country music concert , trump was at his most presidential , stating from the diplomatic room at the white house : in moments of tragedy and horror , america comes together as one and it always has .
but when it came to solutions , the president offered little more than looking at gun control laws as time goes by .
read further : trump 's politicised reaction to new york attack a far cry from las vegas shooting read more

here 's a partial transcript of trump 's remarks before his cabinet meeting , via the white house press pool : today we mourn the horrifying terrorist attack in new york city just blocks away from the sight of the world trade center .

the man drove a truck into a pedestrian bike path and murdered eight people and injured very , very seriously at least 11 more.all of america is praying and grieving for the families who lost their precious loved ones .
horrible act .

our hearts break for them and we pledge to renew our resolve in their memory.my administration is coordinating with closely between federal and local officials to investigate the attack and to further investigate this animal who did the attacking .
i am today starting the process of terminating the diversity lottery program .
i 'm going to ask congress to immediately initiate or get rid of this program .
it sounds nice .
i 'm not nice .
it 's not good .
it has n't been good .
and we want to get rid of chain migration .
this man who came in , or whatever you want to call him , brought in with him other people .
and he was the point of contact , the primary point of contact , for and this is preliminary , for 23 people who came in or potentially came in with him .
and that 's not acceptable .
we have a lot of good bills in there that are being stopped by democrats because they 're being obstructionists .
and honestly they do n't want to do what 's right for our country .
we need strength .
we need resolve .
we have to stop it .
he came in through the diversity program as you know and we 're going to stop it .
terrorists are constantly seeking to strike our nation and it will require the unflinching devotion to our law enforcement , homeland security and intelligence professionals to keep america safe .
we have to get much tougher and we have to get much smarter .
and we have to get much less politically correct .
we 're so politically correct that we 're afraid to do anything .
we will never waiver in the defense of our beloved country .

here 's video of the send him to gitmo moment before trump 's cabinet meeting : cspan ( @ cspan ) president trump on sending # nycterroristattack attacker to guantanamo bay : `` i would certainly consider that . ''

the guardian 's julian borger notes the guantanamo prison is in administrative and legal disarray : julian borger ( @ julianborger ) move to send ny attacker to # gitmo , just as gitmo mil commission is in a state of collapse .

documents.title: us confirms visa status of suspect
text: here 's a statement from tyler q. houlton , the acting press secretary for the department of homeland security : dhs can confirm that the individual identified in the new york city terror attack was admitted to the u.s. upon presentation of a passport with a valid diversity immigrant visa to u.s. customs and border protection in 2010 .

documents.title: trump : 'send him to gitmo '
text: i would certainly consider that .
i would certainly consider that .
send him to gitmo .
i would certainly consider it .

donald trump , in reply to a question about whether he would consider detaining the suspect in the nyc attack tuesday in the military prison at guantanamo bay , cuba donald trump speaks during a cabinet meeting .
kamm/afp/getty images
here 's video of trump 's statement : abc news politics ( @ abcpolitics ) pres .
trump vows to `` further investigate this animal who did the attacking '' in new york city .
trump says we must get much less politically correct .
we 're so politically correct we 're afraid to do anything .
it appears he 's talking about a new entry in his series of anti-constitutional travel bans , and not for example gun control legislation .
trump announces changes to immigration laws , but it 's unclear what steps if any he will actually take and what power if any he will end up having to effect the potential attempted steps .
rick klein ( @ rickklein ) trump says he is `` starting the process of terminating the diversity lottery program ''

senator mccain agrees with his friend senator graham ( see earlier ) about the selective application of civil liberties protections in terrorism cases : ben jacobs ( @ bencjacobs ) inbox : john mccain says new york attacker should be treated as enemy combatant and is not entitled to miranda rights

documents.title: trump says he 'll consider sending suspect to guantã¡namo
text: trump is ready to mothball us immigration policy and ship the suspect to guantã¡namo .
peter alexander ( @ peteralexander ) breaking : trump says he would consider sending nyc attacker to guantanamo bay .
jennifer jacobs ( @ jenniferjjacobs ) trump said he wants to terminate the diversity lottery program .
it 's not good even if it sounds nice , he said , per @ twitterid .

documents.title: trump : suspect an 'animal '
text: jennifer jacobs ( @ jenniferjjacobs ) trump at start of cabinet meeting calls nyc killings a horrible act committed by an animal .
the associated press ( @ ap ) breaking : trump calls nyc terror suspect an `animal , ' says he 'll ask congress to close immigration lottery program .
daniel dale ( @ ddale8 ) trump has now used `` animal '' to describe such a muslim immigrant terrorist and hispanic immigrant gang members .
never white american killers .

senator chuck grassley has sent letters to the departments of state and homeland security seeking information about the suspect 's immigration status and criminal record : frank thorp v ( @ frankthorp ) sen @ twitterid sends ltr to dhs/state dept asking for info on nyc attacker sayfullo saipov , including his immigration history and criminal record :

documents.title: cuomo suggests trump played 'into hands of terrorists '
text: cuomo : the president 's tweets i think were not helpful .
i think they were not factual .

i think they tended to point fingers and politicize the situation his tweet was n't even accurate as far as i 'm concerned you play into the hands of the terrorists to the extent that you disrupt and divide and frighten people the tone right now should be the exact opposite the last thing it 's about is politics period .
as far as the gun laws , i am increasingly proud that ny state passed some of the smartest gun laws in the country i think it is madness , the number of assault weapons we have in this country .

de blasio on vetting immigrants and on gun laws : we support vetting of individuals not of groups of people just because they belong to a group not because of their religion , or not because of their country of origin.there 's a much bigger conversation we could have about gun safety but there 'll be plenty of time to discuss these issues going forward .
dozens more lives could have been in danger , de blasio says .
ryan stopped that threat immediately .
o'neill says nash thinks what he did was not an act of heroism .
i do n't think we could find a more humble human being .
nash , 28 , was at stuyvesant high school on a separate call when someone came in and told him and his partner there was a vehicle accident .
the police went outside and encountered the suspect .
de blasio says nash is humble .
he deserves the accolades of the people of this city as do his partners .
miller says the notes were handwritten in arabic .
they had symbols and words .
but the gist of the note was that the islamic state would endure forever .
former nypd police commissioner bratton tweets thanks at officer ryan nash .
bill bratton ( @ commissbratton ) to nypd officer ryan nash-thank you for your bravery & quick action in stopping yesterday 's terrorist attack .
truly one of new york 's finest

documents.title: cuomo 'not bothered that the president did n't call '
text: de blasio says he 's not bothered at all by not hearing from the president because he heard from other senior officials .
i do n't think anyone should be politicizing this tragedy at this point in time .
cuomo : i am not bothered that the president did n't call .
i am bothered at an attempt by anyone to try to politicize this situation .
not naming names .
to politicize this event i think is wholly counterproductive .

documents.title: cuomo : 'i received no call from the president '
text: o'neill says he does n't think there are bollards protecting bike path at houston or chambers .
miller declines to characterize statements made by the suspect at the hospital .
miller says saipov has never been the subject of an fbi investigation but may have touched other investigations .
he may have had links to individuals who were the subjects of investigation though he himself was not .
de blasio says he has not heard from the president directly .
cuomo : i received no call from the president but he spoke with the acting secretary of homeland security who offered federal government assistance .
miller says search warrants have been executed overnight and there may be more witness interviews .
recovered in and around vehicle were multiple knives , two imitation pistols a paintball and pellet gun .
eight dead , 12 injured .
investigators are collecting video from security , traffic and bank cameras along the mile-long attack route .
they 'll be reconstructing the suspect 's movement in previous days .
the suspect is at bellevue hospital , awaiting an update on his condition .
it appears that mr saipov had been planning this for a number of weeks .
he did this in the name of isis , miller says , citing notes in the truck .
he appears to have followed , almost to a t instructions isis has put out , miller says .
officer john miller is next .
he 's describing a timeline of the attack .
miller says the investigation is in early stages and details may change .
joint investigation of nypd and fbi joint terrorism task force , nypd intelligence , counterterrorism and nypd detectives .
2.06pm : suspect rents large vehicle home depot in passaic nj .
crosses gwb exits into nyc at 2.43 southbound on west side highway .
3.04 enters bike lane and speeds southbound .
targets bikes and pedestrians in bike lane .
collides with bus .
3.08pm more than a dozen 911 calls .
people down , man with guns in street .
two officers from 1st precinct alerted by people .
they see suspect .
officer ryan nash fires gun at suspect bringing attack to an end .
the fbi agent in charge says that the investigation continues .
he thanks tribeca residents for cooperation .
there 's a site - fbi.gov/nyctribeca - where the public can upload photos and videos from the scene of the attack .
chief carlos gomez of the nypd has an update on security precautions .
he says the halloween parade had more than a million participants .
there were security measures including sand truck barricades and heavy weapons teams .
chief gomez says new yorkers will see a lot more officers and should expect more bag checks at subway stations .
gomez says sunday 's marathon will be safe .
51,000 runners and 2.5m spectators are expected .

the cops have added more sand trucks and blocker vehicles , has more than doubled rooftop observation teams including snipers and added more heavy weapons teams and officers from strategic response group with a mobile response capability .
a large number of canines , plainclothes officers , helicopters , traffic cops all to be deployed .

documents.title: cuomo calls attacker a 'depraved coward '
text: the governor continues : this morning people got up , they went to work , and children went to school , and that 's what makes new yorkers special , that strength , that resilience , that ability to be undeterred .
cuomo on the suspect : this was the actions of a depraved coward and that 's the way it should be regarded because that 's the way it was .
cuomo calls the attack an effort .
the effort killed eight people but in my opinion the effort failed , he says , because it did not create hysteria or chaos .
the goal is to create mayhem and terrorize , and it failed , cuomo says .
the halloween parade last night was a beautiful example of the failure of the attempt .

the city leaders speaking now have yet to hear from the president , the wall street journal reports : mara gay ( @ maragay ) mayor de blasio and gov cuomo have yet to receive a call from president trump , aides say .
cuomo mentions that he spoke with the homeland security secretary and the fbi .
this is not a time to have politics this is not a time to find blame , cuomo says .
governor andrew cuomo asks for thoughts and prayers for the eight fatalities .
there are families today feeling pain that is unimaginable .
he praises first responders and law enforcement .
the performance was phenomenal and top-shelf , he says .
de blasio says the investigation is just beginning but for now there is no indication of additional threats .
sunday 's nyc marathon will proceed as scheduled , de blasio says , with additional security measures .
my message to all new yorkers is do what you do best : be new yorkers show the whole world right now that we will not be moved by terror .

documents.title: de blasio : 'we wo n't blink '
text: mayor bill de blasio says life in the city proceeds .
he pays tribute to the six foreign victims .
he says they now are new yorkers .
we understand this was an attack on our values , he says .
it was an effort to break our spirit .
but as an effort to break our spirit it failed .
he praises the nypd .
we know we 're protected and we know that this place works when people do n't feel deterred .
this violence was an effort to make us blink , and we wo n't blink .
we wo n't change .
the mayor commends officer ryan nash , a five-year police veteran who shot the suspect .
we 're listening to the police update .
the death toll remains eight .
the deceased include five argentinians , one belgian , and two americans .
fourteen were transported to hospital .
two died , four are being treated with critical injuries and eight have serious injuries .
correction : this post has been updated to reflect the nationality of one of the deceased victims as belgian , not german .

documents.title: police update
text: nypd news ( @ nypdnews ) watch live as @ twitterid , @ twitterid , @ twitterid & @ twitterid update new yorkers on yesterday 's terrorist act
happening soon : nypd news ( @ nypdnews ) # happeningsoon : @ twitterid , @ twitterid , @ twitterid , @ twitterid & others providing an update on yesterday 's terrorist act in manhattan
update : that explains it .

as journalism has demonstrated , it 's not unusual for the president of the united states these days to spend his morning live-tweeting fox and friends , the morning show starring steve doocy , brian kilmeade and ainsley earhardt .
doocy , earheardt , kilmeade .

drew/ap that 's what it appears trump was doing when he tweeted a misleading attack on the top congressional democrat to his 42m followers on the morning after a terror attack in his hometown # presidenting daniel dale ( @ ddale8 ) why is trump attacking schumer ?
probably because sebastian gorka just attacked schumer on fox and friends .
here 's footage of minority leader chuck schumer on the floor of the senate this morning calling out trump for what schumer says is a lack of leadership : cspan ( @ cspan ) .
@ senschumer : `` the contrast between president bush 's actions after 9/11 and president trump 's actions this morning could not be starker . ''

senator lindsey graham is out making his perennial call to treat suspects in terror attacks on us soil as enemy combatants , meaning the suspects would not be read their miranda rights ( you have the right to remain silent ) and may be tried in a military tribunal instead of civilian court .
graham made the same argument after the 2013 boston marathon bombings .
civil liberties advocates say that graham 's suggestion is pernicious and would backfire on its own terms .

they point out that the enemy combatant designation is meant for fighters captured in battle , and that there has been no indication that civilian courts ca n't handle terror suspects arrested in the usa .
suspending civil liberties on such occasions would set a dangerous precedent , advocates warn .
jill filipovic ( @ jillfilipovic ) stop glorifying terrorists - that is what they want .
he 's a common murderer , and our courts are fully equipped to deal with him .
below , graham incorrectly asserts that reading a suspect miranda rights stops the interrogation .
in fact if law enforcement does not read a suspect miranda rights , information from an interrogation may not be admissable in court , and a potential conviction may be lost .
fox news ( @ foxnews ) .
@ lindseygrahamsc : `` we 'll find out more about this guy if you do n't read him his miranda rights , because that stops the interrogation . ''

graham is a fence-sitter on torturing suspects , having supported the right to use secret enhanced interrogation tactics while saying he 's against torture , with the meaning of the distinction to him unclear .
road closures are in effect in downtown manhattan following yesterday 's attack .
mostly the city is circulating as usual , however .
the morning commuting window is just now coming to a close .
here are details of the closures via the new york police department : nypd news ( @ nypdnews ) road closures in lower manhattan due to police investigation .
the mayor is tweeting words of support for victims and their families .
we 're awaiting a law enforcement update within the hour .
bill de blasio ( @ billdeblasio ) yesterday was a painful day for our city .
we are keeping victims and their families in our thoughts and prayers .

documents.title: schumer responds to misleading trump attack
text: senate minority leader chuck schumer has responded to a misleading attack this morning by donald trump , who blamed the democratic leader for an immigration policy that trump said led to the admittance of the suspect in tuesday 's attack .
the guardian has not confirmed the visa status of the suspect , and the president 's version of how the suspect was admitted may be inaccurate .
the policy in question , a diversity visa program , was part of a 1990 immigration bill that schumer supported when the policy debate resurfaced in 2013 .
at the time , however , schumer favored eliminating the diversity visa policy in favor of a comprehensive policy overhaul .
chuck schumer ( @ senschumer ) i guess it 's not too soon to politicize a tragedy .

president trump , instead of politicizing and dividing america , which he always seems to do at times of national tragedy , should be focusing on the real solution antiterrorism funding which he proposed cutting in his most recent budget , schumer said in a statement .
i 'm calling on the president to immediately rescind his proposed cuts to this vital antiterrorism funding .
arizona senator jeff flake , a republican who announced last month that he would not run for reelection following repeated clashes with trump , corrected the president on twitter .
jeff flake ( @ jeffflake ) in fact , had the senate gang of 8 bill passed the house , it would have ended the visa lottery program and increased merit based visas .
correction : this post has been updated to clarify a reference to the year , 2013 , that schumer worked on the legislation in question .

documents.title: america since 9/11 : timeline of attacks linked to the 'war on terror '
text: the attack on tuesday in lower manhattan is one of a number of major terrorist attack on us soil that has been carried out by those who have claimed inspiration from islamist terror groups like al-qaida or isis .

it is the latest attack of its kind since the 11 september attack on the world trade center in 2001 that left nearly 3000 people dead and prompted president george w bush to launch military action against al-qaida in afghanistan .
here is a timeline of other major terror attacks in the us : america since 9/11 : timeline of attacks linked to the 'war on terror ' read more
the new york stock exchange , which lies a few blocks east of where the suspect was shot , has opened its trading day with a moment of silence .
trump captures the moment on twitter : donald j. trump ( @ realdonaldtrump ) # nycstrong # usaðºð¸

documents.title: 'we feel safe ' : defiant new yorkers parade on halloween
text: hours after a terror attack , tens of thousands of new yorkers gathered in manhattan for a halloween parade , and even those dressed as chickens said they were not afraid .
the police took care of the attack , said marc cruz , a 28-year-old in a chicken costume .
he said he felt pretty safe .
brandon mccall , 29 , was wearing a luxuriant feather jacket paired with a handmade chicken mask and bright yellow tights .
asked if he had considered not coming to the parade because of the attack that afternoon he said , oh no , not at all !
so many people were telling me not to come .
i said , you have to live your life . '
said alexandra colon , 37 , who came to the parade as kate winslet in titanic , with a cardboard leonardo dicaprio hovering over her shoulder .
read further : 'we feel safe ' : defiant new yorkers parade on halloween despite truck attack read more
here is a map of the route of the attack : route of new york attack

documents.title: isis note found , says cuomo
text: a note was found by investigators looking into the new york truck attack referencing the islamic state , new york 's governor andrew cuomo has said .
speaking to cbs , cuomo said the investigation was still ongoing , and called the driver a depraved coward .
he said the attack did not instill terror among new yorkers .
meanwhile police are searching for evidence in the paterson , new jersey , neighborhood where the suspect is believed to have lived .
officers cordoned off an apartment building early on wednesday , and searched a garage .
the building 's manager told the record that sayfullo saipov lived with his wife and two children in a two-bedroom apartment .
the man , who identified himself only as ali , says he rented the apartment to the 29-year-old several months ago .
a man who identified himself as saipov 's neighbor told nj advance media he often saw saipov standing on the corner talking to friends .
the city is home to a large muslim population and a mosque is near the apartment .

the associated press reports from the scene of the attack : an eerie emptiness hovers over a major new york city traffic artery , one day after a deadly truck attack along a popular bike path near the world trade center .
morning rush-hour traffic has been banned wednesday along a stretch of the highway in lower manhattan .
police helicopters circled overhead .
some runners and bicycle riders did their best to maintain their normal routines .
but police blocked off the bike path north of where the rampage began .
truck drivers steered clear of the frozen zone to make their morning deliveries .
investigators worked to determine what led the truck driver to plow down people on the riverfront bike path , killing eight on tuesday .
the driver is in critical condition after police shot him in the abdomen .
hello and welcome to our live coverage of developments following a truck attack in new york city on tuesday afternoon that killed eight and injured 11 .
police in new york are scheduled to hold a news conference at 11am et with updates .

police said the truck drove south just after 3pm after entering a pedestrian and bicycle path along the hudson river on the south-west side of manhattan , where it struck a number of people , coming to a stop not far from the memorial to the 9/11 attacks 16 years ago .

play video eight people killed after truck drives on to new york bike path video report the suspect has been identified as 29-year-old sayfullo saipov , an uzbek citizen who came to the us legally in 2010 .
he was shot and is in custody , hospitalized but expected to survive .
donald trump called for new restrictions on immigrants after the attack .
on wednesday morning he tweeted new details he said related to saipov 's entry into the us .
donald j. trump ( @ realdonaldtrump ) the terrorist came into our country through what is called the `` diversity visa lottery program , '' a chuck schumer beauty .
i want merit based .
donald j. trump ( @ realdonaldtrump ) we are fighting hard for merit based immigration , no more democrat lottery systems .
we must get much tougher ( and smarter ) .

@ twitterid here 's our latest news coverage , including coverage of the victims , five of whom were friends visiting from argentina : eight people killed in new york 'act of terror ' after truck drives on to bike path read more we 'll have coverage of the fallout from the attack throughout the day here .
